body_html: This is OK for now, but having realized that this will cause scalar additions to serialize into possibly very large (constant filled) tensors, it feels like we should prioritize adding proper scalars to ONNX.

body: This is OK for now, but having realized that this will cause scalar additions to serialize into possibly very large (constant filled) tensors, it feels like we should prioritize adding proper scalars to ONNX.
